sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT yumi.* , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY YUMI_NO) AS RNUM , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY YUMI_NO DESC) AS RNUM2 , (SELECT YSM_MCLASS_NM FROM YSM_M_CLASS WHERE YSM_HCLASS_CD = 'G1' AND ODR = yumi.G1_GB) AS validation , (SELECT YSM_MCLASS_NM FROM YSM_M_CLASS WHERE YSM_HCLASS_CD = 'G2' AND ODR = yumi.G2_GB) AS instruction , (SELECT YSM_MCLASS_NM FROM YSM_M_CLASS WHERE YSM_HCLASS_CD = 'G3' AND ODR = yumi.G3_GB) AS scaling , (SELECT YSM_MCLASS_NM FROM YSM_M_CLASS WHERE YSM_HCLASS_CD = 'G13' AND ODR = yumi.G13_GB) AS ensure FROM YUMI AS yumi WHERE 1=1
yumi.DB_INS_TM >= #schYsmStartDt#
yumi.DB_INS_TM <= #schYsmEndDt#
yumi.ADDR LIKE CONCAT('%' , #schText# , '%' )
yumi.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%' , #schText# , '%')
yumi.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%' , #schText# , '%')
) A
WHERE RNUM2 > #firstIndex# AND RNUM2 <= #lastIndex# ORDER BY RNUM DESC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YUMI ( YUMI_NO , REG_ID , G1_GB , G2_GB , G3_GB , G4_GB , G5_GB , G7_GB , G8_GB , G12_GB , G13_GB , G14_GB , G15_GB , YSM_DT , BIRTH_DT , YSM_STT_HOUR , YSM_STT_MIN , YSM_END_HOUR , YSM_END_MIN , DB_INS_TM , CONTENT , TITLE , GENDER , FATE , NARCISSUS , ADDR , WEEK_CD ) VALUES ( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(hyu.YUMI_NO),0)+1 FROM YUMI AS hyu) , #regId# , #g1Gb# , #g2Gb# , #g3Gb# , #g4Gb# , #g5Gb# , #g7Gb# , #g8Gb# , #g12Gb# , #g13Gb# , #g14Gb# , #g15Gb# , #ysmDt# , #birthDt# , #ysmSttHour# , #ysmSttMin# , #ysmEndHour# , #ysmEndMin# , NOW() , #content# , #title# , #gender# , #fate# , #narcissus# , #addr# , #weekCd# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YUMI SET G1_GB = #g1Gb# , G2_GB = #g2Gb# , G3_GB = #g3Gb# , G4_GB = #g4Gb# , G5_GB = #g5Gb# , G7_GB = #g7Gb# , G8_GB = #g8Gb# , G12_GB = #g12Gb# , G13_GB = #g13Gb# , G14_GB = #g14Gb# , G15_GB = #g15Gb# , CONTENT = #content# WHERE YUMI_NO = #yumiNo#
